responses.text: Hey... you seem to be bothered by something. What is it?

dynamic_line: You probably want me to leave and strike out on my own now, right?

I don't know... I've seen animals leave their parents once they're adults and thought you might want the same. It's fine if you want me to leave. I have the skills to take care of myself if I need to.

responses.text: I was thinking it'd make more sense for family to stick together in these times.
Yes. Perhaps it is time you left the nest. Stay safe out there.

dynamic_line: I've just been sorta doing my own thing... I don't really have a direction or goal apart from staying alive.

responses.text: Would you like to stick with me for a time?
Right. Well, it was good to see you again. Let's meet again sometime.

dynamic_line: You want me to be with you for a while?

responses.text: Wait. On second-thought, maybe not right now.
